## Source: ossf-package-analysis (71ad197e17a4f1665c156bce2f7d8849e5455fa417b34fd32cb59bcd8b383519)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@template-builder/iframe-api' @ 1.0.20 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
